summary:
A personal computer (PC) is a computer made for one person to use. It's typically used for tasks like writing documents, browsing the internet, playing games, and watching videos. PCs come with a metal case holding the computer parts, a screen, and a keyboard.

In the past, people had to write their own programs to use computers. Now, most people use software made by others, like Microsoft Windows or Apple's macOS.  "PC" now usually means a computer with a Windows operating system and Intel hardware. Other types of PCs use different systems, like macOS or Linux.
title: Personal computer
